structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Larceny By Stealing; Punishment; Victim Sixty Five Or Older; Minimum Sentence For Repeat Offenders

text.section: Whoever commits larceny by stealing from the person of a person sixty-five years or older shall be punished by imprisonment in the state prison for not more than five years or in jail for not more than two and one-half years.
Whoever commits larceny by stealing from the person of another shall be punished by imprisonment in the state prison for not more than five years or in jail for not more than two and one-half years.
